sqlMap.statement: SELECT A.SVC_MACH_MSTR_TRK_PK FROM SVC_MACH_MSTR_TRK A WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.SVC_MACH_MSTR_PK = #svcMachMstrPk# AND A.TRX_RGTN_DT = #trxRgtnDt# AND A.UPD_FLD_TXT = #updFldTxt# AND A.NEW_VAL_TXT = #newValTxt# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY A.SVC_MACH_MSTR_TRK_PK DESC
